entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is called out by name and responds to Harry's question.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: The Cloak is mentioned as something that Luna needs to get under.

entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: Ravenclaws are mentioned as a group of students who flood into the common room.

entities.name: alecto
entities.description: Alecto is lying unconscious in the common room and is prodded by a first-year student.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as closing his eyes and sinking into Voldemort's mind.

relationships.description: Luna needs to get under the Cloak.
